title: Netoge no Yome wa Onnanoko ja Nai to Omotta? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Romance   School Life   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Chat Rooms   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Strong Love Interests   Tsundere   Yandere

description: Our naive protagonist proposed to a female character in an online game, only to find out that this player is actually a guy. Traumatized by that, he decided to never trust a girl online, but now, two years later, a female player is proposing to him. What will happen?>
